name: Prisoner Escape
description:
Prisoner Escape is a Crossy Road style game.
Run! Tap! Swipe!
Escape as far as you could from the police.
Tap fast and do not let the Police Helicopter get close to you!

Play and unlock achievements to unlock cute characters.
Earn fast money by completing Repeatable achievements!
Now, come on an adventure in Escaping the Prisoner!
